post.summary: ListAlerts returns a list of all Alerts.

items.description: Channel represents a single Notification Channel.

disabled.description: True if that channel is disabled.

routing_key.description: The PagerDuty key for "Events API v2" integration type. Exactly one key should be set.

service_key.description: The PagerDuty key for "Prometheus" integration type. Exactly one key should be set.

basic_auth.description: BasicAuth represents basic HTTP auth configuration.

disabled.description: True if that rule is disabled.

items.description: Filter repsents a single filter condition.

type.description:
FilterType represents filter matching type.

 - EQUAL: =
 - REGEX: =~

items.description: RuleParam represents a single rule parameter for List, Change and Update APIs.

name.description: Machine-readable name (ID) that is used in expression.

severity.description: Severity represents severity level of the check result or alert.

template.description: Template represents Alert Template that is used to create Alert Rule.

created_at.description: Template creation time. Empty for built-in and SaaS templates.

expr.description: PromQL query expression with templating parameters.

items.description: TemplateParam represents a single template parameter.

bool.description: TemplateBoolParam represents boolean parameter's default value.

default.description:
BooleanFlag represent a command to set some boolean property to true,
to false, or avoid changing that property.

 - DO_NOT_CHANGE: Do not change boolean property. Default value.
 - TRUE: True.
 - FALSE: False.

float.description: TemplateFloatParam represents float parameter's default value and valid range.

default.description: Default value if has_default is true.

has_default.description: True if default value is set.

has_max.description: True if maximal valid value is set.

has_min.description: True if minimal valid value is set.

max.description: Maximal valid value (inclusive) if has_max is true.

min.description: Minimal valid value (inclusive) if has_min is true.

name.description: Machine-readable name (ID) that is used in expression.

string.description: TemplateStringParam represents string parameter's default value.

default.description: Default value if has_default is true.

has_default.description: True if default value is set.

unit.description:
ParamUnit represents template parameter unit.

 - PARAM_UNIT_INVALID: Invalid, unknown or absent.
 - PERCENTAGE: %
 - SECONDS: s

severity.description: Severity represents severity level of the check result or alert.

source.description:
TemplateSource defines template source.

 - BUILT_IN: Template that is shipped with PMM Server releases.
 - SAAS: Template that is downloaded from check.percona.com.
 - USER_FILE: Templated loaded from user-suplied file.
 - USER_API: Templated created via API.

yaml.description: YAML (or JSON) template file content. Empty for built-in and SaaS templates.

severity.description: Severity represents severity level of the check result or alert.

status.description:
Status represents Alert Rule's and Alert's combined status.

 - CLEAR: No alert.
 - PENDING: Pending, but not triggering alert.
 - TRIGGERING: Triggering (firing) alert.
 - SILENCED: Silenced alert.

post.summary: ToggleAlert allows to switch between silenced and unsilenced states of an Alert.

silenced.description:
BooleanFlag represent a command to set some boolean property to true,
to false, or avoid changing that property.

 - DO_NOT_CHANGE: Do not change boolean property. Default value.
 - TRUE: True.
 - FALSE: False.

service_key.description: The PagerDuty key for "Prometheus" integration type. Exactly one key should be set.

basic_auth.description: BasicAuth represents basic HTTP auth configuration.

disabled.description: Enables or disables that channel. Should be set.

service_key.description: The PagerDuty key for "Prometheus" integration type. Exactly one key should be set.
